pullrequest.title: Better chunk metadata for gaps in telomeric regions and between supercontigs

content.raw: @hoffman this is ready for your review again. I've addressed your individual changes and clarified code further with comments and updating names. I've also pulled out large chunks of code into separate functions.
content.html: @hoffman this is ready for your review again. I've addressed your individual changes and clarified code further with comments and updating names. I've also pulled out large chunks of code into separate functions.
